item.title: Known Sigma 400's
item.description: A very fast cruiser racer of Rob Humphries hull design based on the 1988 Whitbread Maxi “Rothmans”. She delivers spectacularly in heavy weather with balance, stability and no slamming Boat Name Boat No Location Previous Names Current Owner Notes Baiji Intemperance S4015 Brighton Jagga / Jenny Mac 2/ Hindsight Paul & Val Shilling Miss behaving Again Croatia?
